website_summaries.verdict: Waterproof oiled nubuck ladies' KEEN boot with warm insulation.
pros: Elegant  and lightweight boot is highlighted by a dressy, weatherproof leather upper and non-marking rubber outsole
Interior is treated for natural odor protection
Will keep you warm in temperatures as low as -4 degrees Fahrenheit

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I love keen shoes and boots. My sister swore by these Boots and bought several pair before they stopped making this style, so I got a pair. I found them not supportive enough and they just did not fit my foot like other Keens, so I sent them back. The return was a delight as I was credited as soon as they shipped out of the UPS store with a free return label from Amazon. Can’t ask for anything better. The shoes were$5 less than competition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, Warm and Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great Keen quality. Beautiful leather, waterproof and warm. My ankles and feet get cold in the winter and these feel warm and comfortable around the ankles. The insoles are fairly flat. I do have foot issues and wear orthotics, so I purchased a better insole. I own several pairs of Keen Presidio and Presidio Sport Mesh. My feet love Keen shoes. My only recommendation is for Keen to keep producing great shoes but line them with an insole that matches the quality of your shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Kept my feet dry!
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is fairly large - larger than I expected visually & actually - but that means in colder weather I can wear double socks. I wore them for the first time in torrential rain to walk multiple rescue dogs and had completely dry feet. Although the tall sides are lined, you need to wear tall socks to keep the sides from rubbing. The soles grip without tripping and the rounded toe allows you to roll through your stride. Good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Ross

customer_reviews.title: These will provide the typical Keen
customer_reviews.text: As far as size goes. I normally wear an 8 in a Keen shoe. These tend to run a little bigger. I had to step down to a 7.5. As far as comfort goes. They are the typical Keen experiece. Comfortable from the minute you slip them on. I do have to say, that these shoes are a bit on the flat side. But I am moving from a Targhee II to this boot, so that could be the difference in feel.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyMunroe

customer_reviews.title: Not the usual Keen fit for me
customer_reviews.text: Keens have been a travel go-to for me. I have 2 Keen sandles, 2 Keen sneakers that I've worn and worn on trips. They usually end up pretty smelly (especially the sandles because rubber is like that), but they are practical, functional, and I can walk in them all day. I had high hopes for these Keens, but the arch on the right shoe hits me completely wrong, and the left shoe doesn't feel like one is there at all. Maybe it's my feet in these particular shoes, but sadly, I have to return.
customer_reviews.author: T in CA

customer_reviews.title: love them
customer_reviews.text: i ordered a half size down than what i do with my tennis shoes. i can fit a plantar fascitis insert and a thin wool sock in them just fine on first day. they are easy to get on and off (not much work loosening up the strings) which is a major bonus. super cute but I do have say that they have a kind of duck feet shape which is good because it allows your toes to grab and not be so restricted. I got the black pair and interested in the green as well. not a bad deal for around $40 or so! also they seem like they will be pretty water resistant too.
customer_reviews.author: on a mission

customer_reviews.title: SUPER comfortable, water resistant hiking boots
customer_reviews.text: You will not be sorry you purchased these boots! Plenty of toe room for thick socks, very lightweight, nice looking. I have worn these boots in the snow and my feet were plenty warm. Have worn them in the rain, feet stayed dry. Traipsed around the rainforest in Puerto Rico on several occasions and my feet were dry and cool. I’ve even happily worn them at work all day long (I’m a teacher and on my feet constantly)! I would gladly buy pairs for everyone I know if I had the money!
customer_reviews.author: Spanishteach

customer_reviews.title: Foot Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Keen, you have not let me down. I have bought your boots regularly, and they fit perfect, hiking 15 miles and not one issue on rough terrain. The bed or where your toes spread as you walk give adequate room. This is always an issue for me and again, Keen covers this issue for me. And just let me add, they are cute as all get out.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Keeeeeens!
customer_reviews.text: I got these a few months ago because all the wellies i tried had too flexible of a shank. I wear these with a full orthotic and then put the sole insert on top of it. Originally they fit very snug, so I wore thin socks, but now that they are broken in, they feel perfect. They are wide enough for my toes to wiggle, a sturdy shank, and they really are waterproof! Kb
customer_reviews.author: kieren

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love keen boots. I had a similar pair that I’ve had 6 years and the sole finally wore away. They feel like wearing slippers as they are extremely comfortable. I have wide feet and these are the only type of boots that feel comfortable for me. They are rated -5 F and we get weather colder than that and my feet are warm and dry on my daily walks. Love these boots
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Keen on Keen
customer_reviews.text: Fun, warm and durable. I love Keen's products, and these will keep my feet toasty during a winter trip to NYC. I usually wear a 7.5 but had to buy an 8 to fit my SuperFeet (insoles) in them. Otherwise, a pretty good fit.
customer_reviews.author: June B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my feet warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love these Keen Kaci boots. One star off because they are a little short. I normally wear a 10.5 and got the 11 because I wear thick socks when it's freezing outside and there isn't a lot of toe room. No thick socks with these unfortunately, but they do keep my feet warm with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: zuzupetal

customer_reviews.title: Great- except one flawed boot.
customer_reviews.text: BUT had to return. Sadly, one of the boots had a overlapping bunched up lining right at the ankle seam, making it uncomfortable ! The other boot was great! Had to return, and unfortunately there were none to replace them in my size. I really loved the look, kinda dressed up work boot! I do wonder about arch support if wearing for long walks, or even just all day. Love Knees, but there foot beds leave a lot to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed! Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so unbelievably comfortable! They’re fairly wide (which is nice for thick winter socks) and super light weight. They’re also surprisingly warm considering how light they are. I’ve worn them with mid weight socks in 10F and my feet stayed warm even after the 1/2 mile walk into work! I like these boots so much I ordered another pair in a different color!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to friends and family
customer_reviews.text: Size: I ordered my usual size in boots and they were a little short. When I returned them for a bigger size, the half size up wasn't available so I went a whole size. While they seem just a little roomy, they still work fine. Quality: I love them! They are warm and SO comfortable and really, really good looking. I get compliments all the time. This is my first pair of Keens, but I will stick to this brand. I don't think you can beat them for looks and quality.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! The fit is great, they are lightweight, warm and waterproof. I wear a 6 and ordered a 6 and have enough room to wear thick socks if needed. These are my 3rd pair of Keen’s. I am hooked on their shoes. I love the wide toe box. Even though my foot is in a boot I feel as though my foot has lots of freedom to articulate. Not to mention they are lightweight. Keen’s last forever! I have another pair of WP boots from keen that I wear in the Rainey season of the great NW and they still look brand new. Love Keen’s!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about ordering the correct size but i went with my usual 9.5 and they are perfect! the toe box is def roomy and these are very comfortable and easy to get on and off. I got the black for the price ($50 something) and they are definitely worth it. I can't wait for another hike so that i can wear them again :)
customer_reviews.author: Dee Dee

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet, so I was very pleased that these fit so comfortably, I could wear them all day right out of the box. I intended to purchase a decent hiking boot, but I find myself wearing them everyday casually, as they look cute with leggings or skinny jeans. They are warm, lightweight and very comfortable. I will buy again when I wear though these ones.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the boots
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying the boots - They are comfortable - I ordered a 1/2 size larger so I could wear warm socks in them. My feet are wide and these boots provide toe room. It hasn't been really cold yet but they are certainly warm enough.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable dry and warm!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! I have wide feet but not wide enough to order the wide sizes, these are perfect. They are roomy enough at the toes to wear thicker socks. After I received them I put them on and went for a 2 hour hike in the woods through the snow. Very comfortable and warm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Love teaching

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite boot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Keen boots, comfortable and durable. I have a pair in every color offered. I like the rounded toe box which doesn’t squish my toes. I spray them with water proofing. Got caught in a rainstorm and puddles of water, the boots were soaked, but they dried out perfectly. I feared they’d be ruined from being soaking wet. Also, I like that they provide ankle support. They stay tied. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic boot
customer_reviews.text: I love this boot. I have two pairs, one black and one wine. They are very comfortable. I have a wide foot plus arthritis in my toes and they give me plenty of toe room. I have wore them to work and out walking with no problems. I did put a special insert in them which helps my foot problems. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable, but not a warm COLD weather boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Extremely comfortable, but not as warm as expected from reading other reviews. Centaintly not good for temps much less than 30 degrees F, (and I wear only wool socks all winter). O.K. for short periods of time in cold weather, but if you're looking for warmth for long periods of time outside in COLD temperatures, I wouldn't recommend these. If you want a roomy comfortable boot for mild weather, these are great!
customer_reviews.author: jb miller

customer_reviews.title: not made in Oregon
customer_reviews.text: The Keens I've purchased in the past have all been made in our great country of The United States. These were made in a different country. It seems there is a complete difference in the comfort, support and technology concept. These are not thick, or supportive, or as warm through the entire boot. These will do in a pinch, but for every day, cold weather wear, I will be certain to research WHERE my boots are made.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Well Built, Comfortable, Great Support & Fab Color!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well made, and very comfortable! They were recommended to me by a friend who broke two bones in her ankle. I broke three bones in mine, and these were my go to boot while my bones healed! Now I use them for hiking and love them! The blue color is incredible and I am very picky about now wanting them to get dirty, because the color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Kyiah

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these Kaci shoes a couple of times so far, but am very pleased with them. Finally a shoe with a truly wide toe box for my ridiculously sensitive toes! I wear the five-finger shoes most of the year, but need something warmer during the winter, & usually i suffer dreadfully from my toes being squished, but the Kacis are so much more comfortable. I went with the recommendation on the sizing chart & bought my normal size instead of sizing up as usual with Keens, & they fit perfectly. Good job, Keen!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hope Schoenfeld

customer_reviews.title: Overall quite pleased
customer_reviews.text: I really do like their look. I appreciate their warmth potential and am hoping to have a nice warm winter. I stand eight hours a day and was pleased with the good reviews about comfort. I do think they are a bit roomier than expected. I don’t think it will cause any problems. I find them stable which is very important. I enjoy the even stride they provide. I would very much like to purchase additional laces for down the road replacement to keep the matching colors.
customer_reviews.author: KarenP

customer_reviews.title: Warm and nice design
customer_reviews.text: I got this boot alittle larger then what I wear. 8, usually 7.5 I like the design and color. Room for insert. And very warm, for which I am grateful. First time I wore these I had to stand in frosty weather for over 2 hours waiting for a bus and my feet never felt cold. I did notice that they scuff easily after a week of walking and wearing, probably due to their color and nubuck.
customer_reviews.author: Susanna

customer_reviews.title: Supportive, roomy, great design, a Keen lovers must!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these!! I have ankle issues and these are so supportive. One of the reasons I love Keens is the feeling of being grounded to the floor in them and these stay true to that feeling! Will totally be buying another pair in a different color!!!
customer_reviews.author: KristinaRenee'

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Keeps win again!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced the insole, as my feet need more of an arch and metatarsal support. Other than that, these shoes are great. Needed very little break in time, waterproof and easy to walk in short snow (2”) or wet grass. I have worn Keens for work and for walking. These were true to size, and since I got the wides, plenty of room in the toebox, and narrow enough to stay on my heel.
customer_reviews.author: Louise E.

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof boot
customer_reviews.text: I just wore these for the first time today and was able to take a walk as well as go holiday shopping and they felt perfect. I have a foot issue which means I need a wide toe box and these fit the bill as well as having a removeable insolenso I can use the one I need. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: love to read chick lit and beyond

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable boots ever!
customer_reviews.text: Pure comfort right out of the box. I have THE hardest feet to fit but Keen has done it right again. My right foot and ankle are slightly deformed from an old injury and the foot is almost a size smaller than my left. Sized these boots to fit my good foot and I can't even tell the difference! I also have rather wide feet with high arches. Again, perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Comfortable. Toe box is wide, but this is true for most Keen shoes. I ordered a 9 1/2, should have ordered a 9, but they are comfortable and warm. Got them just in time before the snow and low temperature weather arrived. Have used them around town, walking the dog hike, and running errands. Kept my feet warm in cold teen/low 20s temps.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. My feet are wide and most boots hurt my worst foot. These are absolutely perfect for a wide foot. They may feel too wide for someone with a narrow foot. These are nice and warm with a pair of Smartwool socks. Hope they do not stop making these since the other Keen boots are running much more narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn B

customer_reviews.title: I Purchased Three Pairs
customer_reviews.text: I'm a loyal Keen fan. Having had many foot surgeries, I need footwear that has great support and is comfortable, and Keen footwear provides both. That said, I love these boots so much that I ordered three pairs - tan, rust and navy. The rust and navy were true to size but the tan were slightly wider.
customer_reviews.author: lizmckenzie55

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit and a Perfect Look!
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritic bunions and struggle to find hiking boots and dress shoes. Medium width with a wider toe box is perfect! I am so happy to find these. Heaven! Finding them in black is a bonus! Wearing them on a European trek!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Fits As Expected
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable toe box, I have wide feet. Plenty of comfort in ankle area. Great looking, not bulky. I’m a women’s size 10.5 I ordered a size 10.5 and a size 11. Depending on the shoe style, both sizes can fit me. The 10.5 fit close to perfect. I do think thick socks would make them a bit more comfortable. Going to add insole for extra arch support. I’m keeping them. Returning the size 11.
customer_reviews.author: J Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots after wearing out a pair of Keen Bern boots that were the most comfortable kicks I'd ever worn. These boots are fine, but they aint Bern. These boots are that person you meet on the rebound and you keep telling yourself, "S/he'll do!"...but deep down you know s/he won't. You're still missing your old flame.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: I'll be getting these in other colors for sure
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable right out of the box. If you like Keen Newport sandals you'll like the way these feel when walking - they have softer insoles of course. I like the soft material around the top of the boots too.
customer_reviews.author: ShellyB

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Wore full time for 1 year and 3 months before the sole started to come unglued. Wore them full tone for another 3 months and they would leak really quickly when walking through grass, so I bought another pair! I love them!
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not the usual Keeen sizing nor is the quality the same.......
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointted with the quality and sizing of this boot compared to other Keen boots I have loved.......seems to be cheaper quality and the sizing was different.....larger...... was not happy with the boot for the price compared to their other earlier products.....
customer_reviews.author: kim wieburg

customer_reviews.title: Well fitted
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn these a week or so now but I really like them so far. I did put my own inserts in which provide extra support to my arches. The shoe itself is very good. I stepped in some dirt and when dried, it brushed right off. Love the wide toe.
customer_reviews.author: roscoe

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a boot that fits my feet well, from the start.. no breaking in necessary. So comfortable. Like they were made for my feet!! I would have ordered another pair as soon as I found out how well these fit but.. they suddenly raised the price.. dang it.
customer_reviews.author: Chads

customer_reviews.title: Great Keen Boot!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Especially since they are waterproof! The first pair I ordered in my usual size (8.5) were too big so I exchanged them for an 8 and they fit perfectly. I wore them for the first time today and walked a couple miles at lunch in the snow in them and they felt great (and I usually walk in running shoes!) Great product, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These Keens are super cute and comfortable right out of the box. I ordered a 9 but could probably have gone down a half size. I do love the toe wiggle room though and I simply put some insoles in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality boots.
customer_reviews.text: Best boots ever! Always loved Keen. I have a pair from another purchase that has lasted 10+ years. I bought 2 pairs of these boots for work and I love,love,love them. Very comfy, waterproof and durable. My ankles feel so supported. I did buy a gel insert but that's because I wear them 8 hours a day every day. Highly recommend. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! I like them better than my Merrells. The toe box is a little roomier. So my toes don't feel squished. They are light to walk in. I did add arch supports as I really need them. Walked all over Greece in them with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: JeanM

customer_reviews.title: Quality.  Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Keen shoes for years and I love them! Fantastic quality. Everyone knows you always go up a size in Keen but something changed and I had to send back my 11's (I'm a true 10). Too big. The 10.5 was too big too. I don't know if the boots are sized differently because all my Keen shoes are 11. Anyway, order your actual size.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: No traction on wet floors!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work in a deli kitchen. I am disappointed because they have zero traction on a wet floor. I almost got hurt from slipping a bunch of times during just one shift. Also, I have had Keens before and they fit and felt perfect for me. These boots do not fit the same nor are they the same high quality as my other Keens. It's too bad because I love how they look!
customer_reviews.author: Kristopher Schiltz

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for my plantar fasciitus!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, i can wear them all day long and have no heel pain! They are easy to get on and off, i sprayed them so they are water proof, perfect for running outside quick or just to the grocery store, in a bit of rain or snow. Bought my second pair last week too! They hold up well in the weather. My favorite boots!
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ann Duval

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BOOT
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoe, best fit in YEARS; I hate wearing tie shoes, but these are so comfortable that I don't mind at all...They are lightweight, the width is perfect, I would recommend this to anyone. I wear an orthotic, and forget its even there. These are shoes you want to wear!!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots so much I got them in three different colors. They have a great wide toe box, are super warm, and waterproof! They’re also surprising lightweight!
customer_reviews.author: Katharine

customer_reviews.title: Keens?  yes!  These Keens, no.
customer_reviews.text: They are cute boots, and look good with jeans They fit a little small, and seemed too hot for me. I like Keen shoes/boots and wear them often hiking, this pair just wasn't for me. (Note: my sister has this same boot and wore them daily on our 2 week trip to Ireland and loved them)
customer_reviews.author: Kristine R.

customer_reviews.title: I wish they would make more kaci styles
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of boots of this style I have purchased and they are great and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: gego

customer_reviews.title: Best Women's Winter Boots!
customer_reviews.text: Living in icy Minnesota, I needed boots with good tread. These boots are fantastic: Warm, Good looking, with great traction in snow and ice. Note: Walking on glare ice, a person needs to walk very carefully no matter how good the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Discerning Shopper - MN, USA

customer_reviews.title: Good boot for winter casual wear
customer_reviews.text: I really like these boots. They are comfortable and cute. They are warm too! I usually wear a size 10 in keens but these boots run a little big. I switched to a 9.5 and they are perfect. I would suggest ordering true to size or a 1/2 size down.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Turtle

customer_reviews.title: These boots have it all!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots because they are lightweight, waterproof and they keep my feet warm. This is my second pair. They are very comfortable. My regular shoe size is 8.5. I bought these boots in an 8.
customer_reviews.author: Pollywog

customer_reviews.title: Heel bed too wide, color not as shown
customer_reviews.text: Although these looked like nice boots, the color is much lighter than the photo shows - more of a light gray. They looked very "utility". The length and toe area was a good fit but the heel bed was too wide, making my foot slip up and down. I ordered a size 8, which is my normal size. I have returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove, but t-shirt ankle "padding" not acceptable
customer_reviews.text: The shoe was wonderful, loved the fit BUT there is NO padding in the ankle part which I know will rub my ankles and wear through in no time 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Gal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and they loved them and are wearing them daily! Boots look awesome and my friend swears by how comfy they are and warm too!
customer_reviews.author: crowgirl follower

customer_reviews.title: I love my Keens.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace another pair of Keens that I purchased 10 years ago and where finally wearing out. I choose the high tops for winter wear. They are very comfortable. They fit as expected and are perfect for wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Denise M. Baets

customer_reviews.title: Order 1/2 size up
customer_reviews.text: Once I exchanged my original purchase for 1/2 size up I like them a lot. I walk my daughter to and from school in the MInnesota winter which for me ends up being almost 3 miles each day. These are insulated and waterproof and flexible and comfortable enough to be able to walk longer distances.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable hking boots, with no break-in period. lightweight and not clunky. Soft, padded tongue, not stiff as in some other models. Runs true to size. Not for narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Laurelia B

customer_reviews.title: good ankle support and roomy toe box without being too loose
customer_reviews.text: love it fit like keens usually do. moderate good arch supports, not as high as some of the walking shoes so I put in a arch support. I mailed off for and tried 2 other pairs before I got these waterproof walking boots
customer_reviews.author: E. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Roomy toe box!
customer_reviews.text: Very roomy toe box, Which is perfect for my small bunion. Size runs a tad large, even larger than Keens that I already own of the same size. Easy to lace, quick to put on, and very warm and waterproof. Perfect for my Minnesota feet!
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great high quality hiking boot!
customer_reviews.text: I love to hike despite really bad ankles and feet. This boot is so comfy that I enjoy my hikes again! Sturdy, but not cumbersome; totally waterproof! Would work on a wide foot, but perfect fit for a reg width also. Great quality boot!
customer_reviews.author: April Sark

customer_reviews.title: Great boots that last through all seasons.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set of these boots - I wear them for a year or so and get a new pair. They are great for hiking in the fall, warm enough for ice and snow, etc. Great arch support and as comfy as sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Linda B.

customer_reviews.title: Pillows for My Feet
customer_reviews.text: Warm and comfy, true to size (have several pairs of Keen water sandals plus another pair of this style in another color), and a nice looking boot - had a compliment/inquiry the first time I wore them. I expect to wear these a lot this winter. Plus they arrived sooner than expected. All good.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot
customer_reviews.text: So comfy, fits well, the toe area is wider than most boots, given that I probably could've gone down a half size. Cute, comfy, and feel great walking on ice and snow in these, very stable/secure.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya C.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I have short wide feet and these fit like a charm! I lived in them all winter long and expect to buy a second pair this coming winter. Great for hiking and mucking around the yard in the colder weather! Handled mud and snow like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Love These Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Keens. For years I have purchased Keens. I am very happy with this boot. They fit perfectly and comfortably from the first wearing. They are very attractive. I have another similar pair that I have worn for years and will still wear for years. I never doubt the value of a Keen shoe.
customer_reviews.author: NorCal707

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: They look cool, are super comfortable, and required NO break-in period. Took these hiking the first day I had them and was totally comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BLT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good looking!
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! I haven’t tested them in the cold yet, but on a recent trip to Churchill, Manitoba, one of my traveling companions wore a pair, and she raved about them—which is what inspired me to get a pair. They are very comfortable though a bit wide in the toe area. Even wiith my limited use so far, I am confident they will be a great for the rainy and cold Pacific Northwest weather.
customer_reviews.author: Chickadee Parade

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit/cozy warm
customer_reviews.text: Great womans -classy-color with flair & style! Rugged; warm & cozy for Northern Lakes; Canals; Rivers; woodlands; diverse storms & ultra-terrain! Well designed & crafted...yet... ...Clearly NOT a mans construction boot! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: BrendaYoc

customer_reviews.title: Toasty warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Have worn these boots in snow outings twice now and am impressed at how they keep my feet warm and dry. They are also extremely comfortable and the soles grip on slippery surfaces well.
customer_reviews.author: amelia d. becke

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time getting shoe that fit my feet and give the support I need with the room in the toe box. This is a complete package. I wore them every day this past winter,
customer_reviews.author: Jami McComb

customer_reviews.title: Best Boots Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair because I LOVE them! They were so comfortable right out of the box! Absolutely love the KEEN Kaci Mid-Boots! I hope they always keep them in their inventory!
customer_reviews.author: norcross

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable. I have terribly painful feet and these are ...
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable. I have terribly painful feet and these are the only boots that I have ever in my adult life been able to wear all day with no issues. Your foot sits back enough that is takes all the pressure off your toes. And the toe is wide enough not to feel constricted. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: lg2

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy on, easy off, comfortable, warm, easy to walk in outside and in. Keen Kaci my favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Little

customer_reviews.title: Is more of a shoe than a boot.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite shoe ever! I need to order another pair before they change the style.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Fodale

customer_reviews.title: My new fav
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Yes, they are wider in toe box but I love that about Keen. I wear these all the time. They have arch support and do not move when I walk. I wear with socks. Love!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Rj Itkin

customer_reviews.title: Best comfortable Boot!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. this is the second pair I have bought!!! True to size and great if you have a wide foot. I wear a 6.5 and fits perfect. I try to walk 5 miles a day and these are so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Annie O

customer_reviews.title: The first boot I ever wore that didn’t hurt my bunion
customer_reviews.text: These boots were so comfortable and warm and there was plenty of room for my bunion that I bought another pair right away.
customer_reviews.author: CHERYL

customer_reviews.title: Keen is consistent
customer_reviews.text: KEENS never let me down. Last year I had a boot that was just like this that also had a zip side. KEEN no longer offers that style, bummer, I loved the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, warm, and good-looking. Hiked and climbed over boulders the first time I wore them. Got sloshed by an incoming wave, and the water-proof feature worked like a charm. Can’t wait to see how they hold up in ice and snow.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and sturdy. Would get 'em again!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I ordered a half size up so I could wear thick socks. Glad I did. I hope to purchase another pair. They are as comfy as my crocs house slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie M.

customer_reviews.title: Happy and warm feet!
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet with a high arch, as well as plantar fasciitis and a heel spur. My feet are difficult to please. I originally bought these in blue, and loved them so much I walked the soles right off of them. These black are to replace the blue. Hands down the best boots for my “special needs” feet.
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but not so warm.
customer_reviews.text: I love how comfortable these boots are, but they are far from as warm as they claim to be. The inside says up to -4, but at +20, my toes froze in less than a 1/2 hour and that was with walking around. Pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan3boys

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much more than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much more than I thought I would. Super warm, comfortable on first wear. I have ankle issues and these have held up for me plus I can remove the inserts and put my own orthotics in! Toe box is crazy wide but that's normal for a Keen shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Arr6810

customer_reviews.title: Love my keens
customer_reviews.text: I wear these boots for play and everyday walking. I have had 4 knee surgeries and severe arthritis in my knees. I can walk further and with more comfort in these boots.
customer_reviews.author: J. De Soto

customer_reviews.title: Just what i need
customer_reviews.text: Nice wide toe box and room for my own orthotic--and warm! Good grip on wet sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Great winter boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They're very stylish and can be worn to work or just out and about. I got a size 9 and they are a little big but I put an insole and it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Seiter

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! So cute and with added warmth and water repellent. Perfect fit! Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: iloveamazon

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I just love these boots! I already had a pair in black and wore them all last winter, including a trip to Germany and Austria with a to of walking and cold temps. So comfortable and kept my feet warm and dry. Keen Shoes are my favorite......
customer_reviews.author: Wrennen

customer_reviews.title: Basic keen look and feel
customer_reviews.text: I have worn them around the house today and comfy so far- really really cute but I've always been a keen fan- wish me luck cause I'm a hospital nurse and I want these to be work shoes- so sick of ugly tennis shoes for work
customer_reviews.author: Ed camp

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: I wear these in the winter for my job. I work 10 on concrete in the cold. The last pair I bought lasted 3 winters, so of course I had to find the exact ones like the last. I like these even more.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Harp

customer_reviews.title: I like the shoes, but they were a bit hard.
customer_reviews.text: There is no arch support, the base is a little too hard. However, overall they are comfortable and durable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: KRISS

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots fit well. They are roomy enough for my heavier winter socks but not too loose with regular crew socks. I walked all over Seattle in them yesterday and my feet didn’t complain. They are warm for May but they are winter boots after all.
customer_reviews.author: bev kittle

customer_reviews.title: Good Ole Keens
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable (after adding my own insole) and cute as Keen's can be (lol) The insole is not of Keen quality so I reduced this review by one star.
customer_reviews.author: Seattle Sue

customer_reviews.title: duck feet beware
customer_reviews.text: Love Keen, wanted to love these but wouldn't fit my wide feet
customer_reviews.author: Chickenmama

product_meta.title: KEEN Women's Kaci Winter Mid Wp-w Rain Boot
product_meta.description: The casual classic gets winterized, with water-repellent leather and a cozy microfleece lining. Elasticized side gores give it a comfortably snug fit, and the lugged outsole helps prevent slipping on slick sidewalks.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA or Imported
Waterproof Oiled Nubuck and Premium Full-grain Leather upper
Removable metatomical PU footbed with arch support
Non-marking rubber outsole leaves no trace
